form.official-title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the need to eliminate partisan redistricting and gerrymandering.

section.text: It is the sense of the House of Representatives thatâ€”

paragraph.text: Congress should establish a Federal reapportionment system that would create compact and contiguous congressional districts that, to the greatest extent possible, follow geographic boundaries and county lines;
congressional districts should not favor or disfavor an incumbent or political party;
congressional districts should adhere to the existing standards of equal population; and
the highest court of each State should have the power to reject congressional district maps that do not meet the above criteria.
